CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 Guo and co-workers used a number of fused thiophene spacers to tune the aggregation behavior of difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX)-based donor polymers among which PffBX-TT with thieno[3,2-b]thiophene as a spacer showed intermediate temperature - dependent aggregation strength allowing the control of blend film morphology during PSC fabrication.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| fused thiophene spacers |
| difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX) |
| PffBX-TT |
| thieno[3,2-b]thiophene |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| fused thiophene spacers |
| difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX) |
| PffBX-TT |
| thieno[3,2-b]thiophene |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names, as they refer to specific chemical compounds or polymers.
